SEARCH
Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the board, which consists of a grid of terrain tiles and manages piece placements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a Board object and initializes the terrain and possible positions.

    • setupTerrain

      public void setupTerrain(Player p1, Player p2)
      Initializes the terrain of the board with lakes, traps, and home bases.
      Parameters:

      p2 - Player 2 Instance

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Places a piece on the board at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to be placed.
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.

    • updatePiecePosition

      public void updatePiecePosition(Piece piece, int newX, int newY)
      Updates the position of a piece on the board.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece to be moved.
      newX - The new x-coordinate (row) of the piece.
      newY - The new y-coordinate (column) of the piece.

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(int x, int y)
      Checks if the x and y coordinates are within the bounds of the board and returns the terrain at that position.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      Returns:
      The terrain at the specified coordinates, or null if the coordinates are invalid.

    • getTerrain

      public Terrain getTerrain(int x, int y)
      Gets the terrain type at specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate (row)
      y - Y coordinate (column)
      Returns:
      Terrain object at position

    • isLake

      public boolean isLake(int x, int y)
      Checks if a specific tile is a lake.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      Returns:
      True if the tile is a lake, false otherwise.

    • isTrap

      public boolean isTrap(int x, int y)
      Checks if a specific tile is a trap.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      Returns:
      True if the tile is a trap, false otherwise.

    • isBase

      public boolean isBase(int x, int y)
      Checks if a specific tile is a home base.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      Returns:
      True if the tile is a home base, false otherwise.

    • isOwnBase

      public boolean isOwnBase(int x, int y, Player player)
      Checks if the home base at the specified coordinates belongs to the given player.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      player - The player to check ownership.
      Returns:
      True if the home base belongs to the player, false otherwise.

    • isValidPosition

      public boolean isValidPosition(int x, int y)
      Checks if the specified coordinates are within valid board bounds.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the terrain tile.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the terrain tile.
      Returns:
      True if the coordinates are valid, false otherwise.
